title: Sexual orientation of Americans in 2013
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Sexual Orientations on X-axis for 2 groups Women, and Men. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Sexual Orientation Straight had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Men. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual for Men.
In Sexual Orientation Straight, Women had the maximum Share of respondents and it saw the lowest in Sexual Orientation Bisexual out of all 3 Sexual Orientations.
Sexual Orientation Straight and Bisexual had the biggest gap of 968.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Women.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 3 different Sexual Orientations for 2 groups Women, and Men that are presented on the X-axis.
Sexual Orientation Straight had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Men. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual for Men.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Sexual Orientations on X-axis for 2 groups Women, and Men. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Sexual Orientation Straight had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Men. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual for Men.
In Sexual Orientation Straight, Women had the maximum Share of respondents and it saw the lowest in Sexual Orientation Bisexual out of all 3 Sexual Orientations.
Sexual Orientation Straight and Bisexual had the biggest gap of 968.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Women.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 3 different Sexual Orientations for 2 groups Women, and Men that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Men had the highest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Straight and Men had the lowest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
Among all the Sexual Orientations, Women had the highest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Straight and lowest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
There is a gap of 968.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Women in Sexual Orientation Straight and Bisexual.
Among the groups, Women had the biggest difference in Share of respondents. Where the maximum Share of respondents was 108.56 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents.
On average, the Sexual Orientation Straight had the highest Share of respondents for all 2 groups Women, and Men. Whereas Bisexual had the lowest average Share of respondents.
